creator: Zamein
title: ZAMEIN’S PAINT
description: ZAMEIN’S PAINT is a simple software project developed in Java for practicing graphical element programming. It's a very basic drawing application that allows users to draw lines. It features a user-friendly interface with a color palette on the right and a canvas-clearing button. Version 0.2 includes a toolbar on the left for adjusting the line thickness.
steps: The project involves programming graphical elements using Java.
The software allows drawing of lines on a canvas.
A color palette is provided on the right side of the screen.
A button in the lower right corner clears the drawing canvas.
Version 0.2 adds a toolbar on the left side for selecting the drawing line thickness.
